1207550.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Token Pack: Creature Codex 1: Aatxe - Cueyatl (Token Pack)
1207550.description:
Devin Night Token Pack: Creature Codex 1: Aatxe - Cueyatl

The first pack from Kobold Press' Creature Codex. 56 tokens covering all the A's, b's and C's
This product contains:
  • Aatxe
  • Acid Ant
  • Agnibarra
  • Ahu Nixta
  • Ahuizotl
  • Al Bat King
  • AL Brother OX
  • AL Mouse Lord

  • Alliumite
  • Alp
  • Ammut
  • Angel Eye of The Gods
  • Angel Kinnara
  • Angel Ophanim
  • Angel Sammael
  • Angel Song
  • Angel Zoryas
  • Ankou
  • Anophiloi
  • Arborcyte
  • Arcamag
  • Arcanaphage
  • Astral Snapper
  • Axeban

  • Bearfolk Chieftan

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
